Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubspec.data.dependencies.type

Class GitReference

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubspec.data.dependencies.type.DependencyReference
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubspec.data.dependencies.type.GitReference
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class GitReference extends DependencyReference
Indicating this dependency is referencing remote Git repository.
The remote Git repository must be contained completed Dart project layout inside. If contains in non-root directory, path() must be provided.
The dependency will be downloaded with the latest commit in default branch. If ref() is applied, pub will follow this table to referencing dependencies.
Value of ref Applied result
Branch name Latest commit of this branch name
Tag name A commit which refer to the tag name
Commit hash A commit of specific hash
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:

    • GitReference

      public GitReference(@Nonnull String name, @Nonnull GitRepositoryURL repositoryURL, @Nullable String path, @Nullable String ref) throws IllegalPubPackageNamingException
      Create new Git reference dependency data.
      Parameters:
      name - Dependency name.
      repositoryURL - URL of Git repository.
      path - Path to the package if not in root directory.
      ref - Git reference of getting package.
      Throws:
      IllegalPubPackageNamingException - If dependency name is not legal package name.

  • Method Details

    • repositoryURL

      @Nonnull public GitRepositoryURL repositoryURL()
      Get a URL which pointing to remote repository uses for this dependency.
      Returns:
      Git repository URL of this dependency.

    • path

      @Nullable public String path()
      The package directory location if the package is not in root directory.
      Returns:
      Path to package in Git repository, null if in root directory.

    • ref

      @Nullable public String ref()
      Referencing which Git commit is used for getting dependency.
      Returns:
      Either commit hash, branch name, tag name or null if using the latest commit in default branch.

    • changeRepositoryURL

      Parameters:
      repositoryURL - New location of Git repository URL.
      Returns:
      New GitReference with applied repository URL.
